ygData.subject: Re: Need Brad's email address and we all need to m ail him now
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, that s my intent.  if a monster is green to you time to move on to greener (hehe) pastures.  this doesn t mean you can t ever get those items, it just
ygData.messageBody:
yes, that's my intent. if a monster is green to you time to move on to
greener (hehe) pastures. this doesn't mean you can't ever get those
items, it just means you have to buy them from someone who CAN get them.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 12:56 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Need Brad's email address and we all need to
m ail him now


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

that would mean that gnoll elites and commanders, who are green to me
now,
wouldnt drop the agility earrings... (just an example)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st (or 20th, depending on if
some ass trains a cyclops at me at the aviak village in s. karana or
not)
lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 12:49 PM 6/7/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>
>
>That seems like a good idea.
>
>Does anyone like the idea of greens not giving special items? I know
>this isn't a new idea but I hadn't thought of it for a while till now.
>This would help solve the problem of big chars camping places solely
for
>the loot thereby excluding fledgling groups that really belong there.
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
